body: Wow...that ended more wholesome than I thought it was going to. Is it actually cheating if she's the one making it happen or allowing it to happen? Also, how long till she interrupts them...then surprises her friend by joining in? Also, I wonder if she's willing to share him as a boyfriend with her friend and not just a fuckbuddy. Would be far better than just "lending him" to her if she truly wants her friend to share in her happiness.

Too bad we'll never see more of his art, this one was my fave.. rip author
https://mobile.twitter.com/FAKKU/status/1287523982913097728?s=19
what a good gf she is and a good friend as well. next time she should join in on the fun as well.
